item.title: Help? Rep++
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

Heres the code i was given

c2.sendMessage("" + c.playerName + " received “+ c.randomCrystal +”!");

Heres the error i got.

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

Heres the original post.

Help!

So when you vote you get 5m 25pkp and a misc item.
now i want it to say "+playername+ got “Item name”
heres my code.

[quote]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“voted”)) {
if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) {
c.getItems().addItem(995, 5000000);
c.pkPoints += 25;
c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomCrystal(), 1);
c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>You recieve 5m and 25 Pkp and a misc item.");
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<shad=65280>[Vote]: “+ c.playerName +”: I have recieved 5m 25 Pkp and a random item from ::vote4cash");
}
}
} else {
c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>You have voted or claimed already!");
}
}[/quote]

Read full topic
